INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = JOB_TB.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ AND JOB_TB.state != 'D'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ, sum(CHRGS) CHRGS, sum(NET_SALES) NET_SALES FROM TEST_ITEM_TB where state != 'D' group by QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ ) items ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = items.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = items.QUO_SEQ
LEFT JOIN SLS_TB ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = SLS_TB.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = SLS_TB.QUO_SEQ AND SLS_TB.state != 'D'
LEFT JOIN SLS_TB chqSls ON QUO_TB.CHQ_YM = chqSls.CHQ_YM AND QUO_TB.CHQ_SEQ = chqSls.CHQ_SEQ AND chqSls.state != 'D'
LEFT JOIN CMPY_TB ON JOB_TB.CMPY_SEQ = CMPY_TB.CMPY_SEQ
where 1=1
and IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_CODE,'9999') = #{item.searchWord}
and IFNULL(FN_MEM_NAME(QUO_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and date_format(QUO_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and date_format(SLS_TB.CNFRM_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and IFNULL(FN_MEM_NAME(SLS_TB.CNFRM_ID),'') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
order by QUO_TB.ins_dt asc ) lst order by no desc LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};
